formalpara.title: Figure 3. Deletion library arrangement in the −80° C freezer
formalpara.para: The live frozen worms and single well lysates are arranged in Tupperware-style boxes (upper schematic), and the boxes are arranged on the freezer shelves (lower schematic). Use this arrangement and, after removing plates for screening or thawing, replace the plates in their proper location to minimize the amount of time spent searching for the correct plate.
